enthuse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to talk about something in a very interested or excited way
enthuse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Rick was there, enthusing about life in Australia.
enthuse.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make someone interested in something or excited by it
enthuse.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The owners were certainly enthused by the offer.
enthuse.translation[0].definitions[1].no: Enthuse is usually passive in this meaning
